1.title: The Real Radio Show! Guest: COUNTING CARS from History Channel Part 1
1.plot: The Real Radio Show! Guest: COUNTING CARS from History Channel (Part 1). Indie Recording Artists: What Model Citizen, J.RAD, and a lesson from Anthony of Ink Krypted Hydrografix Plus. so much more.

3.plot: The Real Radio Show! Guest: Chef Barret of Hell's Kitchen Season 11 and CME/MEGAFORCE/Sony Red Recording Artist, KILLCODE. Indie Recording Artists: "TRAFFIC MOVING WELL", a performance by Krissy "The Car Girl" and so much more.

imdb.plot outline: A Hi-Energy Show! -- Unscripted, with Celebrities and Indie Acts from around the World. An Entertainment Show like no other; loosely connected by the Bizarre humor provided by the Cast: Frankie Dee, Henry K , Mark Mendoza (Twisted Sister), & The Beautiful Krissy.
imdb.title: The Real Radio Show
plot: Entertainment, Talk, Celebrity Interviews, Indie Music & so much more... Hosted by: Frankie Dee, Mark Mendoza (Twisted Sister), Henry K & Krissy.

A Hi-Energy Show! -- Unscripted, with Celebrities and Indie Acts from around the World. An Entertainment Show like no other; loosely connected by the Bizarre humor provided by the Cast: Frankie Dee, Henry K , Mark Mendoza (Twisted Sister), & The Beautiful Krissy.
